title: I never loved you
creator_credit: Cassandra Tytler, Monkey Suit Productions, Corinne Preston and Rebecca McPherson
brief_description: Broken hearts, longing and regret…..”I Never loved you” does a tango and a twirl around the question of love. It exalts in the high passion and tragedy of love and romance, all the while too aware that love can be finite and fleeting. Tough guys singing tender songs to gals with innocent hearts but eyes that have seen too much; doe-eyed lovers are left with bloodshot eyes, nursing regret and a broken heart; the carousel of love moves on, passion can make you giddy and then throw you off balance. Where did it all go wrong? Cast includes: Alex Ben Mayor, Louise Woodward, Connal Parsley, Charlie Sheldon.
creator_credit_for_label: Cassandra Tytler, Monkey Suit Productions, Corinne Preston and Rebecca McPherson
